Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.3 Paccayavāra » 2.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.3.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nakamma
Kusalattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nakamma
147.
529Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  kusale khandhe paccayā kusalā cetanā. (1)
530Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  akusale khandhe paccayā akusalā cetanā. (1)
531Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā, kiriyābyākate khandhe paccayā kiriyābyākatā cetanā; bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā…pe…  upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā kiriyābyākatā cetanā. (1)
532Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  vatthuṃ paccayā kusalā cetanā. (2)
533Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  vatthuṃ paccayā akusalā cetanā. (3)
534Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  kusale khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā kusalā cetanā. (1)
535Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  akusale khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā akusalā cetanā. (1)
